title: screen freeze on full screen
body: when i go full screen screen freezes from 5 to 10 sec in random moments in game even in clashes . i remember riot saying that they are aware of this issue about a month ago but mine never got fixed . pls riot fix this i cant play a decent game and there were no ping issues nor internet issues . all was normal which is why this was brought to my attention.

replies.body:
The issue from a month ago was a signal error that resulted from playing in full screen and since been resolved.  A workaround for this was pressing Alt+Enter, which you can try and let me know the results,  

Otherwise it sounds like your issue could be different, possibly caused by a driver having problems rendering the game at your resolution.  Make sure that your resolution is not exceeding 1920x1080 or on a 4K as well, as they're not currently supported and could run into any issues.  

I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide just to be sure that your drivers are in good shape as well.

Let me know if you have any questions!

@porocles

Still a continuing bug for Nvidia drivers. just updated. will check crash logs and post if it continues.
